Module org.im4r0ve
Package org.im4r0ve

Class App

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
org.im4r0ve.App
public class App
extends javafx.application.Application
Main class that generates the whole user interface and handles all of the user input

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Launches the app

    • start

      public void start​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Entry method for the app. Initializes everything.
      Specified by:
      start in class javafx.application.Application

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Function initialize() gets values of variables from corresponding text fields and initializes all of the data structures based on variables

    • initMainView

      private void initMainView​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      InitMainView generates all of the visible UI
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - - Main window of the application

    • initSimulation

      private void initSimulation()
      initialization of all the simulations

    • updateAntGenomes

      private void updateAntGenomes()
      Updates all AntGenomes after pressing Apply changes

    • drawMap

      public void drawMap​(Tile[][] map)
      Draws map by iterating through 2D array of object Tile. While iterating it calculates the color of each tile and displays it.

    • generateToolbar

      private javafx.scene.layout.HBox generateToolbar()
      Generates the top toolbar of the UI
      Returns:
      Returns an object of horizontally stacked buttons

    • generateSettings

      private void generateSettings()
      Generates accordion style settings on the left side of the UI. For now it is also responsible for setting up default values of Simulation and AntGenomes

    • addAnthill

      private void addAnthill()
      Adds anthill Titled Pane to the settings panel.

    • addAntGenome

      private void addAntGenome​(int health, int weight, int speed, int strength, float viewRange)
      Adds AntGenome Titled Pane to the settings panel.

    • handleStep

      private void handleStep​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the press of step button in the toolbar. Updates the map by calling step on the simulation in the new thread and then the main thread shows the map when it has time.

    • handleStart

      private void handleStart​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles start button. Starts the simulator.

    • handleStop

      private void handleStop​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles stop button. Stops the simulator.

    • handleReset

      private void handleReset​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Resets the map to default and allows apply button to be pressed.

    • handleApply

      private void handleApply​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Applies all the changed settings. Only available in the EDITING state.

    • loadImage

      private void loadImage()
      Loads image of a map from predefined path and creates a map that is displayed in the window.

    • processImage

      private void processImage​(javafx.scene.image.Image image)
      Processes defaultImage by reading it's colors and creating internal Tile[][] map based on material that they represent.

    • clone

      private Tile[][] clone​(Tile[][] toCopy)
      Copies one Tile[][] to another. It is needed for resetting the map.

    • setApplicationState

      private void setApplicationState​(App.States state)
      Changes application states and blocks buttons that should not be used,
      Parameters:
      state - new state of application

    • createTextField

      public javafx.scene.layout.HBox createTextField​(java.lang.String label, java.lang.String defaultText)
      Creates formatted label and TextField next to it that is responsible for changing variables.
      Parameters:
      label - for better clarity and also serves as identifier for accessing textFields.
      defaultText - of the textField.
      Returns:
      returns one HBox, which consist of one Label and TextField next to it.
